name: Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Tetsuman Advance ~Menkyo Kaiden Series~
summary: Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Tetsuman Advance ~Menkyo Kaiden Series~ is a Miscellaneous game, published by Kaga Tech, which was released in Japan in 2002.
